page.name: Customer Service
page.page_description: Welcome to the Customer Service status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Customer Service OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Customer Service's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [EU+CA] Public Cloud control panel unavailable, VPS order funnel
incidents.message: Start Time : 05/07/2023 04:00 UTC End Time : 05/07/2023 07:07 UTC On July 5th 06:03 am CEST, OVHcloud has identified a partial unavailability of its services affecting Public Cloud and VPS customers. During this time, the management of the following services was degraded: Compute, Storage, Network, Containers & orchestration. Access to data on Standard Object Storage Swift & Cloud Archive was not possible. Access to the Public Cloud segment of the OVHcloud manager was also unavailable. No data was lost during the incident. Concerning VPS, ordering, upgrade, reinstallation and unsubscribe were unavailable as well as Snapshot and Automated backup features. Resources of both Public Cloud and VPS remained available during the course of the incident, excluding Standard Object Storage Swift and Cloud Archive. The incident was fixed at 9:07am CEST, thanks to our fully mobilized teams, with a progressive ramp-up to a nominal state up until 11:00am CEST for all affected services. We sincerely apologize to all affected customers.
incidents.timestamp: Jul <var data-var='date'>5</var>, <var data-var='time'>06:33</var> - Jul <var data-var='date'>7</var>, <var data-var='time'>09:22</var> UTC

incidents.name: [EU][Customer Panel & API] - api.ovh.com/Customer Panel
incidents.message: Start Time : 22/06/2023 08:58 UTC End Time : 22/06/2023 09:49 UTC Service impact : Customers were getting error 503 when using api.ovh.com Customer panel is operational but was facing some errors. Root cause :A network issue caused the incident Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

incidents.name: [GLOBAL][API] - API issue
incidents.message: Start time : 21/06/2023 09:49 UTC End Time : 21/06/2023 10:45 UTC Root cause :An internal component had a dysfunction, that caused the API and the customer panel outage. This component has been restored in its normal state. Service impact :Customers were getting error 503 when using api.ovh.com. Customer scripting using infrastructure as code with APIs were also impacted. Customer panel was also facing errors Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

incidents.name: [Global][Support] - Issues contacting Support
incidents.message: Start time : 07/06/2023 06:32 UTC End time : 07/06/2023 15:11 UTC On Wednesday June 7th at 8:27 AM (CET), a network malfunction impacted the VoIP services of some of our customers. OVHcloud technical teams immediately intervened to identify the cause of the incident and resolve it. Impacted services have been restored on 07/06/2023 15:11 UTC and are now operational. You can contact our customer service on 1007 or open a support ticket from your Help Center. We apologize for any inconvenience this may has caused. We will update our support pages with new information as soon as available.
incidents.timestamp: Jun <var data-var='date'>7</var>, <var data-var='time'>08:21</var> - Jun <var data-var='date'>8</var>, <var data-var='time'>16:30</var> UTC
